name: Heat Wave (itch) (ghost dev)
description:
GAME INFO:

in this game you have to restore power by filling up the heat machine which is in a different place each level and you have to go find it and  shoot it with  your gun and if enemies come in your way just use the gun and kill them!

try out the game and tell me what you think in the comments.

WARNING: I am not an artist so everything in this game will make your eyes sore XD (not really its a joke,  have fun though!)

SOURCES:

the soundtrack I used in this game is free from a website called free sound and this is the link: https://freesound.org/people/josefpres/sounds/624395/

I generated the gunshot sound effect from a website called sfxr: https://sfxr.me

all the other assets I made myself and some I drew in krita.
